summary: 2014 HARLEY DAVIDSON STREET GLIDE.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO MOTORCYCLE RECALL NOTICE AND UNSATISFACTORY CUSTOMER SERVICE AT DEALERSHIP.  *SMD  WHEN THE CONSUMER CALLED HIS LOCAL DEALER, TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT, HE WAS INFORMED, THEY WERE REPAIRING MOTORCYCLES THEY SOLD FIRST AND HIS NAME WOULD BE PLACED ON THEIR CALL LIST.  THE DEALER STATED, THEY DID NOT KNOW HOW MANY KITS THEY WOULD RECEIVE TO FIX THE RECALL.
